publ: by VayuVaidya: Dr Bheemaiah, Anil Kumar
name: LordsWords
0:
”Alexa, open lords words”
”Alexa, start lords words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lords words
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. The story is of a little boy burdened with the words of the Bible and the Holy texts as he carries the books around the church. He meets a tooth fairy , who reveals the meaning of these words, 6:6 of the Book of Genesis, Noah's Ark and other truths about the deluge...., Maybe Earth is water, and the word human is reserved only for the Neptunists, may be the deluge will drown all Plutonists? Are you one?
Maybe the healing has begun, as we respect Earth and restore rivers, but will Noah be the only good man, and will all drown in the deluge?
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
